title: [1.7][64x/128x][JXZ搬运]Storyblock
author: jjxxz2
txt_content:
本帖最后由 jjxxz2 于 2014-7-4 08:55 编辑 




欢迎来到storyblock的家！这张材质可以给你温暖，舒适和快乐的感觉，就像一本故事书。

















生物





更新日志

不翻了(╯‵□′)╯︵┻━┻

2.3: Nether+
June 21st, 2014
Blocks: Netherbricks, Soul sand, Netherwart[/background]
Mobs: Ghast, slime, magma cube, zombie pigman, blaze, skeleton, wither skeleton.
Items: Netherbricks, Netherstar, Netherquartz, Blaze powder.
Animations: Nether portal, fire, lava
GUI: Buttons, Crafting table interface, hunger/health/armour/experience 

2.2: Friendly mobs
May 5th, 2014
- ALL the friendly mobs: Pig, cow, horse, sheep, chicken, dog, wolf, bat, squid, ocelot, cat, mooshroom, iron golem & snowman
- All the villagers
- Some monsters because what the heck: creeper, spider, cave spider & zombie
- Added the trapped chests - like vanilla, they are identical except for one small detail (I never use trapped chests so I don’t know if this is the way to go - people who do use them, please comment!)

2.1: Entity Update
April 4th, 2014
- Enchantment book- Arrow- Boat & icon
- All particles
- Experience orbs
- Changed rain
- Explosion animation- Minecart & icons- Chests

1.7 Update
- Added all the new blocks;Podzol, red sand, acaia, old oak, packed ice and colored glass.
- Added all the new flowers & plants- Added single chest texture- Improved tiling on spruce & oak planks- Changed grass to go better with the plains biome (less black lines).

- Rain is now less thick.- New spruce log texture.- You can now see through doors!
